title: Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2
overview:
Sired in an act of vampire insurrection, your existence ignites the war for Seattle's blood trade. Enter uneasy alliances with the creatures who control the city and uncover the sprawling conspiracy which plunged Seattle into a bloody civil war between powerful vampire factions.
♞Become the Ultimate Vampire
Immerse yourself in the World of Darkness and live out your vampire fantasy in a city filled with intriguing characters that react to your choices. You and your unique disciplines are a weapon in our forward-driving, fast-moving, melee-focussed combat system. Your power will grow as you advance, but remember to uphold the Masquerade and guard your humanity... or face the consequences.
♝Descend into Seattle’s Dark Heart and Survive the Vampire Elite
Seattle has always been run by vampires. Hunt your prey across Seattle locations faithfully reimagined in the World of Darkness. Meet the old blood founders present since the city’s birth and the new blood steering the tech money redefining the city. Everyone has hidden agendas - so choose your allies wisely.
♚Enter into Uneasy Alliances
Choose a side among competing factions, each with their own unique traits and stories, in the war for Seattle’s blood trade. The world will judge you by the company you keep, but remember no one’s hands stay clean forever.
♛Experience the Story
Written by the creative mind behind the original Bloodlines, Vampire: The Masquerade® - Bloodlines™ 2 brings the ambitions of the first game to life and sees the return of a few fan favorite characters.

title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
overview: Hollow Knight: Silksong is the epic sequel to Hollow Knight, the epic action-adventure of bugs and heroes. As the lethal hunter Hornet, journey to all-new lands, discover new powers, battle vast hordes of bugs and beasts and uncover ancient secrets tied to your nature and your past.

title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake
overview:
The Prince has returned! Experience the classic tale that redefined action-adventure gaming in this full-scale remake for a new generation.

- You are the Prince of Persia. Embark on a journey to save your kingdom from the treacherous Vizier.
- Master the Sands of Time and use your dagger to reverse, accelerate, freeze, and slow time itself.
- Fight cursed enemies and solve puzzles along the way.
- Experience incredible graphical enhancements and re-designed gameplay mechanics.
- Unlock Prince of Persia, the original game from 1989, along your journey.

title: Replaced
overview: REPLACED is a cinematic retro-futuristic action-thriller set in a dystopian alternative version the of the 80s' USA. You are R.E.A.C.H. - an AI trapped in mortal human body against it's will. Explore the world, push your body's limits in intense combat and learn what it's like to be a living being.

title: The Wolf Among Us 2
overview:
Play as Bigby, “The Big Bad Wolf” and Sheriff of Fabletown, as you return to a gritty detective noir world where there are no fairy tale endings.

The Wolf Among Us 2 picks up six months after the events of season one. It’s winter in New York City and a new case threatens to cross the line between Fabletown and the NYPD. How you choose to approach it could determine the future of the Fable community.

title: Grand Theft Auto VI
overview:
WELCOME TO LEONIDA

Grand Theft Auto VI heads to the state of Leonida, home to the neon-soaked streets of Vice City and beyond in the biggest, most immersive evolution of the Grand Theft Auto series yet.

title: Star Citizen
overview:
FIGHT. TRADE. EXPLORE. 
A UNIVERSE AWAITS.

Imagine a universe that combines the freedom of exploration, the thrill of combat, and the unique challenge of building a life in space. Star Citizen puts ultimate control in the hands of the player, whether you're making your way as a cargo hauler, exploring the vastness of space, or scraping out a living outside the law, you will navigate through a mixture of procedurally generated and handcrafted worlds and interact with a variety of characters.

title: The Outer Worlds 2
overview: New solar system, new crew, same Outer Worlds. The Outer Worlds 2 is coming...and when that day is closer we will show you more...but until then enjoy this.

title: Ghost of Yotei
overview: A new game titled Ghost of Yotei. More details to come.

title: Crimson Desert
overview:
Crimson Desert is an open-world action-adventure set in the beautiful yet brutal continent of Pywel. Discover adventure, uncover wonders, and experience thrilling action as you witness the saga surrounding Kliff, leader of the Greymanes, whose mission takes him on an incredible journey.

From the snow-blasted mountains of Kweiden to the verdant expanses of Akapen and the towering ridges scattering the Crimson Desert, this land is a testament to nature's grandeur. Yet, amidst this beauty, the continent stands locked in war as factions vie for unprecedented power.

Discover adventure, explore exciting locations, and fight thrilling battles as you travel across an incredible open world filled with wonder and mystery.

Join Kliff, captain of the Greymanes, and his comrades as they embark on a relentless journey to defend Pywel and fulfill their mission. Along your perilous path stands both dependable allies and countless foes who will stop at nothing to see your downfall. Face trials to uncover the truth of the catastrophe looming over Pywel and restore peace to the continent.

title: ARC Raiders
overview:
ARC Raiders is a free-to-play, reimagined, cooperative action shooter that offers an intense struggle in every session: together with your squad, defend our home and resist the onslaught of ARC – a ruthless mechanized threat descending from space.

You play as one of the Raiders, a rogue group of resistance fighters. With the help of a patchwork early warning system, you fight to protect our home against enemies dropping from orbit. ARC is faceless and unfeeling, but no one could accuse ARC of being unresponsive. In fact, ARC responds to resistance with ever-increasing destruction.


Resist
As a Raider, you know that defeating ARC requires more than simply pointing and shooting a gun, and more than one person trying to be a hero. When ARC is around, lone wolves never make it very far.

As underdogs, we need to believe in something bigger than our own strength, in something unapologetically human. That’s why we come together. United amid the unlikelihood of success, what seemed implausible may just become the best course of action. So, by all means, come prepared and plan ahead, but sometimes you just have to wing it.


Jump right into the fray in a free-to-play world.
Scavenge the ruins of the past. Wield tools and gadgets to outsmart the enemy. Use on-the-fly tactics, your surroundings, and physics to your advantage. If you and your squad play well together, one day the stars may again become beacons of hope, instead of omens of oblivion.

Reimagine the third-person shooter – Go beyond simply matching ammo to a weapon. Experience action where combat demands unrehearsed creativity.

Reimagine cooperation – ARC pursues you relentlessly, but together you can overcome these faceless foes. Fight, flee, and fine-tune, shoulder to shoulder with your squad.

title: MОUSE
overview:
MOUSE, a gritty and noir-fueled FPS shooter that draws inspiration from classic cartoons of the 1930s.

MOUSE boasts a unique visual style inspired by the charm of 1930s rubber hose animation, transporting players to a nostalgic era of early cartoons. Assume the role of a private detective navigating a noir city teeming with gangs, mobs, and characters from the dark side. Unravel a quest for justice in a noir city mired in chaos, corruption, and vibrant energy, utilizing a diverse arsenal of weapons, power-ups, and explosives to thwart the takeover by corrupt politicians. The game's playful weaponry and distinctive health display, coupled with enemies behaving like cartoon characters, add a lighthearted twist to traditional FPS gameplay.

title: Hell is Us
overview: If war is the closest we get to hell on earth, it's because Earth harbours the worst of demons: humankind. In an isolated country ravaged by infighting, discover the secrets of your past and deal with the repercussions of a mysterious calamity.

title: Little Nightmares III
overview: Embark on a new adventure in the unique world of Little Nightmares. In Little Nightmares III, you follow the journey of Low & Alone, as they search for a path that could lead them out of the Nowhere. Face your childhood fears together with a friend in online co-op, or in solo with an AI companion.

title: Silent Hill f
overview: SILENT HILL f – will be a completely new story set in 1960's Japan featuring a beautiful, yet horrifying world. Written by Ryūkishi07, famed for Japanese visual novels dealing with murder mysteries, psychological and supernatural horror.

title: Borderlands 4
overview: See if you have what it takes to go down in history as a legendary Vault Hunter as you search for secret alien treasure, blasting everything in sight.

title: Cronos: The New Dawn
overview: Cronos: The New Dawn is a pulse-pounding, third-person survival horror game where time is your deadliest weapon — and your worst enemy. Survive a brutal future, dive back in time, and stop nightmarish creatures from merging into unstoppable abominations.

title: Directive 8020
overview: A new game titled Directive 8020. More details to come.

title: Resident Evil 9: Requiem
overview:
Resident Evil Requiem is the ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series.

Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core.

Technological advancements combined with the development team's depth of experience combine in a story with rich characters and gameplay that's more immersive than ever before.

A new era of survival horror begins in 2026. Requiem for the dead. Nightmare for the living.

title: Where Winds Meet
overview: Where Winds Meet is an epic open-world action-adventure RPG rooted in the rich legacy of Wuxia. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.

title: Ninja Gaiden 4
overview:
The definitive ninja hack & slash franchise returns with NINJA GAIDEN 4! Embark on a cutting-edge adventure where legacy meets innovation in this high-octane blend of style and no-holds-barred combat.

Return of the Legend: Experience a return to the intense, high-speed combat that established NINJA GAIDEN as a premier action game series. Prepare for a legacy reborn with captivating style for a new generation of players.

Epic Hack and Slash Combat, Evolved: NINJA GAIDEN 4 fuses Team NINJA’s tempered combat philosophy with the stylish, dynamic action gameplay of PlatinumGames. Engage in visually stunning combat that rewards precision and strategy. Use Bloodbind Ninjutsu to transform your weapons and unleash devastation upon your enemies, alongside legacy techniques like the Izuna Drop and Flying Swallow. The legendary Ryu Hayabusa also returns with a revamped yet familiar set of tools to master.  With a customizable player experience, NINJA GAIDEN 4 will push action game veterans to their limits while allowing newcomers to enjoy a heart-pounding adventure full of twists and turns.

An Ancient Enemy Returns: An endless rain of miasma hangs over a near-future Tokyo in the wake of an ancient enemy’s resurrection. The fate of the city lies in the hands of young ninja prodigy, Yakumo. Fighting his way through cybernetic ninja soldiers and otherworldly creatures, Yakumo must reconcile a destiny he shares with the legendary Ryu Hayabusa himself and free Tokyo from the ancient curse that brought the city to its knees.

title: Dying Light: The Beast
overview: A new game titled Dying Light: The Beast. More details to come.

title: Battlefield 6
overview: Lock & load for the ultimate all-out warfare experience. Fight in high-intensity infantry combat. Rip through the skies in aerial dogfights. Demolish your environment for a strategic advantage. In a war of tanks, fighter jets, and massive combat arsenals, your squad is the deadliest weapon. This is Battlefield 6.

title: Reanimal
overview: The original creators of Little Nightmares™ & Little Nightmares™ II have returned to take you on a more terrifying journey than ever before. In this co-op horror adventure game, you play as a brother & sister who go through hell to rescue their missing friends. Exploring by boat and on land, you must use your wits to survive, work together to escape the hellish island, and the dark secret that haunts you.

title: Marathon
overview: A massive ghost ship hangs in low orbit over a lost colony on tau ceti iv. the 30,000 souls who call this place home have disappeared without a trace. Strange signals hint at mysterious artifacts, long-dormant ai, and troves of untold riches. You are a runner, venturing into the unknown in a fight for fame… and infamy. Who among you will write their names across the stars?

title: Metal Eden
overview:
METAL EDEN is an adrenaline-rush sci-fi FPS.
An advanced HYPER UNIT ASKA is sent on a suicide mission to rescue the citizens’ COREs from the vast monolithic city MOEBIUS once a hopeful new home for humanity now turned into a deadly trap.
Blast your way through the INTERNAL DEFENCE CORPS in cybernetic warfare, confront the ENGINEERS and uncover the mysteries of the project EDEN.
Dive into cybernetic warfare against the machine forces that protect the secrets of an artificial world. Fight a diverse roster of tough, agile mecha troops and elemental forces.  Extract energy cores and destroy the INTERNAL DEFENCE CORPS shields to gain a battle zone advantage. Develop your arsenal and combat capabilities to become an unstoppable HYPER UNIT.You are a HYPER UNIT - an advanced battle android.
Built to protect. Specialized in recon missions. Powered by a PHANTOM CORE.  Dash, grapple and wall-run through the INTERNAL DEFENCE CORPS using enhanced parkour skills. Harness your superior agility and acrobatic combat prowess in pulse-pounding encounters. Transform into an ARMORED RAMBALL to charge into action and take on new and deadly machine foes. Control the air and dominate the battle with your gravity hooks and jetpack.MOEBIUS  – a vast monolithic city high above the planet’s surface protecting the mysterious HIVE TOWER.  Run by mysterious ENGINEERS, once a hopeful new  home for humanity has turned into a deadly trap. Explore the brutalist and monolithic environments of the derelict orbital city and the mysterious world below, VULCAN. As HYPER UNIT ASKA, engage in the ongoing conflict over the consciousness of a lost human colony stored within reinforced storage units.

title: Cairn (2025)
overview: Reach a summit never climbed before in this survival-climber from the creators of Furi and Haven. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive the unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.

title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A
overview:
The story is set in Lumiose City, where an urban redevelopment plan is underway to shape the city into a place that belongs to both people and Pokémon. Compared to Lumiose City as it appeared in the Pokémon X and Pokémon Y games, released in 2013, more greenery now adorns the city, alongside facilities with a cutting-edge feel.

In Lumiose City, spaces frequented by people—such as shopping arcades, cafés, and restaurants—coexist with more natural areas, such as waterfronts and verdant parks. At the center of Lumiose stands Prism Tower, the very symbol of the city.

title: 007 First Light
overview:
007 First Light is a brand new James Bond video game developed and published by IO Interactive.

Featuring a wholly original Bond origin story, players will step into the shoes of the world's favorite Secret Agent to earn their 00 status.

title: Cairn
overview:
In this game you have to stack stones. It's a little bit tricky. You have to use your mouse to drag the stones in position.
You just need a little bit of dexterity and luck.

title: Rue Valley
overview:
Break free from a mysterious time loop! Embark on a journey of self-discovery and resilience. Delve into the enigmatic depths of the small godforsaken town: Rue Valley.
Each day feels like an uphill battle against the shadows of your own mind. Along the way, you will encounter a captivating ensemble of characters, each wrestling with their own emotional complexities and revealing hidden depths as you get to know them.
Can you muster the courage to unravel the secrets of this temporal anomaly? Can you discover the strength within yourself to rise above adversity and forge a brighter tomorrow?

Craft your own personality in Rue Valley. You can be a cold-hearted loner who overthinks everything or a melodramatic loudmouth who always trusts their gut instinct.
Whether you reflect your true personality or role-play someone entirely different, your character will shape your dialogues and interactions in the game.
Store memories in a graph, unlocking intentions and mindsets as you progress uniquely through the story. Commit to quirky mindsets for unexpected and hilarious dialogues, and experience personality-altering Status Effects: become more outgoing when drunk, or extra sensitive when anxious.
Experiment with different answers and timelines, because the loop will restart from the beginning anyway, won't it?

title: Digimon Story Time Stranger
overview:
Digimon Story Time Stranger , is an RPG with monster-taming elements that explores the deep bond between humans and Digimon in an epic story that unravels the mystery of the world’s collapse.

Embark on an adventure that spans across the human world and and Digital World , collecting and raising a diverse array of Digimon to fight in turn-based battles.

title: Mina the Hollower
overview:
Mina the Hollower is a bone-chilling action adventure featuring classic gameplay and an 8-bit aesthetic in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era. Smooth 60fps action combat, a world full of mystery and horror, and top-down adventuring combine in a mix that may remind you of classic titles like Castlevania, The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening, or even Bloodborne. Whip foes, burrow through the ground, and explore a pixel-perfect world in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

You won’t want to miss this harrowing, yet heartwarming tale!

title: Kingmakers
overview: Go back in time to a war-torn medieval era with a vast arsenal of modern weapons, change the course of history, and save the future in this epic action/strategy sandbox. Build your kingdom, grab a gun, and lead an army of thousands into massive, real-time simulated battles — solo or in co-op.

title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7
overview: Set in 2035—ten years after the events of Call of Duty: Black Ops II (2012)—Black Ops 7's campaign will follow Black Ops II protagonist David Mason (Milo Ventimiglia) and his team of agents as they pursue "a manipulative enemy who weaponizes fear above all else".

title: Painkiller
overview: A new game titled Painkiller. More details to come.

title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
overview: A new game titled Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter. More details to come.

title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE
overview: A new game titled Terminator 2D: NO FATE. More details to come.

title: absolum
overview: Incarnez les héros exclus de Talamh et rejoignez un combat sans pitié pour arracher la magie des griffes du Roi Soleil Azra dans Absolum, un beat 'em up roguelite original par Dotemu.

title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
overview: Get ready for races that transcend dimensions! Sonic has traveled to all kinds of worlds over the years, but when the Travel Rings bring him to the multiverse, a brand-new adventure, unpredivtable races, and wild competitions await!

title: Baby Steps
overview: Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It.

title: LEGO Voyagers
overview: A new game titled LEGO Voyagers. More details to come.

title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide
overview: Prepare to be scared! A clash between the Flying Dutchman and King Neptune has unleashed ghostly mayhem all over Bikini Bottom. Switch seamlessly between SpongeBob and Patrick, combine their unique skills and save Bikini Bottom from total ghostification!

title: EA SPORTS FC 26
overview:
The Club is Yours in EA SPORTS FC™ 26.

Play your way with an overhauled gameplay experience powered by community feedback. The new Authentic Gameplay option delivers the most true-to-football experience ever in Career, while the Competitive Gameplay option — driven by refined fundamentals, added consistency, and enhanced responsiveness — is tailor-made for play in Football Ultimate Team™ and Clubs.

Put your dream squad to the test in Football Ultimate Team™ with new Live Events and Tournament modes, as well as a refreshed Rivals and Champs experience.

Experience Manager Career like never before with all-new Manager Live Challenges. Earn rewards throughout the new season by taking on a variety of real-world scenarios and alternative storylines — ranging from a few minutes of play to multiple seasons.

Archetypes inspired by the greats of the game introduce new classes to Clubs and Player Career, bringing more individuality to your player. Develop your abilities by upgrading attributes and unlocking Archetype Perks to give your player a distinct feel on the pitch.

Experience The World’s Game like never before in EA SPORTS FC™ 26, with match data from the world’s top leagues powering 20,000+ authentic players.

This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.

title: Sick Samurai
overview: Sick Samurai is a blindingly fast and bloody action game based on instant-death combat. Immerse yourself in lofi hip hop and retro anime aesthetics as you slash and dash your way to becoming the greatest fighter on the island.

title: Octopath Traveler 0
overview: Start from zero and discover the newest entry in the OCTOPATH TRAVELER series. Experience a story of restoration and retribution over the divine rings—an epic saga that unfolds across the realm of Orsterra.

title: Hotel Barcelona
overview: A new game titled Hotel Barcelona. More details to come.

title: Once Upon a Katamari
overview: A new game titled Once Upon a Katamari. More details to come.

title: Bad Cheese
overview: Step into the tiny paws of a mouse spending the weekend at home with a dysfunctional Dad while Mom's away. Be on your best behavior and KEEP DADDY HAPPY.You all live together. You, Dad, Mom, Brother, and the rest of the demons. Try not to cause problems so you don't have to be punished.Scrub, sweep, clean, make fries, kill spiders, bring Daddy his pills—essentially, be a good kid.Explore the house and look for treats and action figures scattered around. This might be the only fun part about living here.Visit various parts of the house, face difficult situations, and experience the gruesome reality of a child-mouse trying to maintain a sense of normalcy in an abnormal household.

title: Hirogami
overview: Explore a beautiful origami world as Hiro, a fan-wielding master of the art of ‘folding’. Embark on a mystical journey to save your fragile home from deadly digital invaders. Take on animal forms to traverse the landscape, solve puzzles, overcome enemies, and save the realm.

title: Tokyo Underground Killer
overview: Dive into the neon-drenched deep underground of Tokyo as Kobayashi, a deadly assassin who harnesses the power of blood energy. Use your sword, mystical abilities and powerful weapons to assassinate highly dangerous maniacs and stop the invasion of the brutal Flatliners terrorizing Tokyo.

title: Otherskin
overview: Embark on a deadly solo mission to uncover Vandermire’s secrets. Absorb alien morphs to evolve beyond human limits. Guided by your AI suit, explore alien biomes, master unique abilities, and fight to survive in a stunning action adventure. The universe is at stake.

title: Project Motor Racing
overview:
Built4racers |

This is Project Motor Racing

Replicating the challenge and sensory overload of professional-level race cars with all the uncompromising passion of big-time motorsport, Project Motor Racing blends 20 years’ worth of racing simulator know-how into one unforgettable racing experience.

All the passion, beauty & intensity of pro motorsport merging the most iconic cars & circuits with a new benchmark in handling performance.

title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian
overview:
This game can be enjoyed entirely offline, with no internet connection required. This title sticks to the traditional Atelier series experience while also building upon it. Atelier fans can enjoy an evolution of the familiar synthesis and battle systems, culminating in a heartwarming story for all to enjoy.


GAMEPLAY FEATURES
Synthesis:
Create your own unique items using the simple yet intricate “Gift Color Synthesis”!
In this simple system, items can be made by adding ingredients according to the recipes. By linking the Gift Colors of ingredients, their traits will be carried over to the finished product. Players can also unlock new recipes by adding specific ingredients to certain recipes. Additionally, each recipe has three arrangement slots where extra ingredients can be added, boosting the effects of the finished product. Players might even be able to discover new ways to synthesize by using the “Catalyst Ingredients” found within the dimensional paths! 

Turn-based Battles:
Enjoy strategic timeline command battles!
Make use of “Multi-Actions” where the action order of allies and enemies can be switched, and “Interrupt” to empower allies with panel effects that are linked to the timeline. Additionally, enjoy even more exhilarating battles by using features such as “Item Mix,” which mixes item elements and effects!

Field Exploration:
Freely roam around the Lantarna mainland while enjoying battles and gathering materials! Players can enjoy their adventure while taking in scenery like never before, experiencing the passage of time from day to night and changes in weather.

Dimensional Paths Exploration:
There are multi-level dungeons known as “Dimensional Paths,” where the map and monsters change with each visit, and rarer ingredients can be obtained as the difficulty level increases. In addition, players might find rare accessories known as “Starpearls” by opening treasure chests or defeating mighty opponents. Explore the dimensional paths in search of higher-quality synthesis ingredients and Starpearls!

Town Development and Shop Management:
Sell items created through synthesis or found while exploring! Help boost the town's restoration activities by selling a variety of items, and then invest the profits and resources earned from the shop to develop the town further. As the town starts to bustle once again, reference books containing new synthesis recipes will be made available, and the story will develop! 


STORY
Two young adults return to their lost hometown in search of truth and to bring back what they hold dear.

The town of Hallfein was once situated at the border of three provinces, and thrived thanks to mining and trade. However, a mysterious disaster struck this peaceful town, causing most of its residents to disappear. The town became a restricted area, and only investigators dispatched from the capital were allowed to enter.

As time passed, restrictions on the town were lifted, and a plan to restore it was initiated. Seizing this opportunity, a young woman and a young man, having come of age after being driven from Hallfein long ago, now return to the land they once called home.

The former hopes to restore the shop left behind by her missing grandfather, and the latter seeks to investigate the mementos left to him by his father. While their reasons for returning differ, they share one common goal: uncovering the cause of the townspeople's mysterious disappearance.

After meeting in their hometown, the two embark on a journey together to seek the truth, unaware of the encounters and revelations that await them...

title: Sunkissed City
overview: Sunkissed City is a life-sim set in an upbeat, sun-kissed seaside metropolis full of funky vibes and quirky characters. Stake out your new life in the city, tending to DIY gardens, learning new skills, and making life-long friends and help bring life back to its once-vibrant streets!

title: High On Life 2
overview: A new game titled High On Life 2. More details to come.

title: Morsels
overview: A new game titled Morsels. More details to come.

title: Kirby Air Riders
overview: A new game titled Kirby Air Riders. More details to come.

title: Ball x Pit
overview: A new game titled Ball x Pit. More details to come.

title: Shadows of Soldiers
overview:
About This Game

Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of "Shadows of Soldiers," an adrenaline-fuelled 8v8 third-person cover-based tactical multiplayer shooter! Prepare to embark on an epic battlefield adventure, where strategic choices and teamwork determine victory.

Select your role from three distinct classes:

Juggernaut - Unleash raw power on the battlefield as the mighty Juggernaut. Armed with devastating weaponry and fortified armor, you're a force to be reckoned with. Crush
your enemies and lead your team to glory. 


Shadow - Become the master of stealth and precision. As a Shadow, you can slip into the darkness, surprising foes with deadly efficiency. Employ your cunning and agility to
outmaneuver enemies and strike from unexpected angles. 


Commander - Lead your squad to triumph with tactical brilliance and keen strategic insights. The Commander class empowers you with the ability to coordinate your team, call in powerful support, and seize the battlefield's critical points.

   
Each class offers a choice of two unique abilities, allowing you to tailor your play style to perfection. Strategically select one ability to equip and deploy in intense battles to turn the tide in your favor.

Conquest/Team Death Match
Join the battle in different game modes, each with unique maps with their lore behind it. There are currently 5 unique maps for conquest and 3 for TDM to explore. 

The game's environment becomes your greatest ally. Utilize the intricately designed cover system to shield yourself from incoming fire, survey the battlefield, and launch calculated counterattacks. 


Weapon Customization
Customization knows no bounds in "Shadows of Soldiers."

Appearance Customization
Personalize your character with a plethora of armor, headgear, and outfits, making your warrior a true reflection of your style and personality. 

We use Discord as our primary communication platform. Join to follow our progress, Be first to know our updates or find other like minded players to team up with. 
https://discord.gg/WhrnRG62zv

Join our YouTube to see the latest developments or watch our streams where the team have discussions and play the game!

title: Goodnight Universe
overview: A new game titled Goodnight Universe. More details to come.

title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Claws of Awaji
overview: Travel to a new distinctive region - the island of Awaji - a place of mysterious beauty. Reclaim a lost treasure while avoiding the traps and ambushes of deadly new foes. Feel the tension of being hunted by a new faction, threatening the mysterious island of Awaji. Master the Bō, a new weapon type for Naoe, unlock new skills, gear, and abilities.

title: Beautiful Light
overview: Beautiful Light, a PvPvPvE tactical first-person extraction shooter where 6 squads of 3 operators are tasked with entering, securing, and extracting an artifact in a hostile, horrific environment. Face other operators and player-controlled anomalies, but beware: mistakes can risk your life and gear.

title: Duet Night Abyss
overview:
Dual Narrative and Demons of All Kinds

You will step into a land where magic and machinery coexist, playing as two protagonists with vastly different backgrounds. Encounter a variety of demonic beings with their own perspectives as you engage in constant battles and exploration to uncover the truth behind a thorny fate, ultimately bringing an end to the spiral of suffering.

Multiple Weapons and Arbitrary Loadouts

In battles, you can freely switch between melee and ranged weapons, allowing characters to break free from the limitations of a single weapon class. Choose from a variety of cool melee weapons such as whipblades, crossbows, and even heavy firepower like sniper rifles, grenade launchers, and high-tech hover guns to create your unique weapon loadouts.

3D Combat and Various Skills

Engage in fast-paced combat against waves of relentless enemies with the freedom to utilize both close and long-range attacks, as well as aerial assaults and ground takedowns. Bask in unexpected and thrilling battle experiences through diverse combat gameplay including tracking, reconnaissance, and rescue missions.

Parkour Abilities and Free Spirit

Utilize various movement techniques like helix leap, sliding, and double jump to swiftly and freely traverse known and unknown environments. Soar to the skies, vault over walls, and perform feats no one else can as you explore and tackle challenges in your preferred style.

title: Adventure of Samsara
overview:
Adventure of Samsara is a mysterious, 2D Metroidvania action-adventure that captures the spirit of the original Atari 2600 title, Adventure, and takes it in an entirely new and unique direction.
With stunning, 2D pixel art, Adventure of Samsara combines classic gameplay, a deeply connected world, and a heady, twisting narrative of death, rebirth and memory. Developed by the Brazilian studio Ilex Games, players take control of the Solar Champion, a long-dead Plutonian resurrected by the primordial light of the Sun. Tasked with reactivating a mysterious interdimensional fortress, the Champion must restore balance to the multiverse.
As players battle through a series of diverse, interconnected biomes and confront brutal mutant bosses, they will unlock new abilities and enhancements – each revealing deeper layers of the game’s enigmatic, cosmic narrative. The game lives in the spiritual landscape of the original Adventure, brimming with its core elements of exploration, curiosity, and hidden secrets. Not a remake or sequel, Adventure of Samsara instead asks players to search for subtle references to the very first adventure game as they journey through a remarkably deep world.
Features- Metroidvania Exploration: Explore 10 unique biomes, from frozen wastes to industrial labs, each filled with distinct enemies, hazards and hidden upgrades.- Classic Gameplay Feel: With classic gameplay and twisted 2D pixel art, Adventure of Samsara evokes a timeless feel while offering something entirely new.
- Original Worldbuilding: Immerse yourself in an expansive, interdimensional fantasy world with a deep, spiritual lore.
- Easter Eggs: Discover nods to the original Adventure, with familiar structures, enemies, and references that reward both new and returning players.
- Collectible Items: Find hidden items, cached away in hard-to-reach corners, to improve your stats and load augments to enhance your abilities and skills.

title: Escape Simulator 2
overview: Sequel to the best-selling escape room game, brings a fresh take on first-person puzzles with a variety of new rooms to explore solo or with friends. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, or craft your own escape rooms with Room Editor 2.0.

title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion
overview:
Digital Deluxe EditionThe Digital Deluxe Edition and Super Digital Deluxe Edition of Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion both include the base game and additional DLC that will release over several months. The Super Digital Deluxe Edition also includes a digital art book and soundtrack that deliver new depth and detail of the world of Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion.Downloadable Contents Available at LaunchBase GameDigital Art Book & Soundtrack (Super Digital Deluxe Edition only)Special Weapon SFX SetArsenal Appearance SetDownloadable Contents Available after LaunchExpansion Pack "Into the Abyss"Reclaimers Outer Appearance SetSovereign Axiom Outfit Appearance Set
Digital Purchase BonusSpecial Equipment - Variable Breadth (Longbow)Bonus Attachment Set 1Bonus Item Set
About the GameBecome the ultimate high-tech warrior in an action-packed new entry in the Daemon X Machina series. Fly into battle in your customized Arsenal, unleashing a variety of attacks tailored to your playstyle. Feel the exhilaration of fast-paced combat as you freely explore a deadly and dangerous open world on land or in the air. After taking down your foes, collect their weapons and equipment, and upgrade your skills to expand your options on the battlefield. Suit up for a dark sci-fi story where you can face the titanic boss battles alone or with up to two other players online. New and veteran Daemon X Machina players alike will find a worthy adventure in the latest from Marvelous First Studio.A Titanic EvolutionDaemon X Machina’s high-octane armored action debuts on a new generation of platforms, bringing with it an epic sci-fi adventure, gameplay that’s accessible to newcomers, and an expanded scope sure to satisfy returning fans. Together You Can Make a DifferenceCooperative multiplayer means you never truly fight alone. Team up with friends online to tackle the epic story and boss battles together.Build a Better You Now a nimble suit of armor, your Arsenal can be fully customized both in design and in loadout, with the ability to craft or salvage new elements.  Beautiful and DeadlyExplore an alien planet in your Arsenal as you battle against mechanical and organic enemies. Trek through the vast open world on foot, fly through the skies, or when all else fails, gallop on horseback across plains, swamps, mountains, and more.

title: JETRUNNER
overview: “A wise man once described Jetrunning as the perfect combination of athleticism and engineering. It’s where the frontier of science meets the breaking point of human mettle… and highly monetizable video broadcasting!”— Mick Acaster, Jetrunning CommentatorWELCOME TO THE WORLD OF JETRUNNERIn a dazzling near-future where gravity is optional and style is mandatory, JETRUNNER is the planet’s most thrilling sport: a pulse-pounding fusion of first-person parkour, fluid controls and fast-paced FPS action, designed for only the boldest contenders. Run, jump, slide, and blast your way through hand crafted arenas as you climb the ranks and etch your name into the annals of Jetrunning history.  FEATURESFluid FPS Parkour Gameplay: Wall-run, vault, grapple, and blaze through courses in style. Built for speed runners, stunt fiends, and highlight reels. 60+ Unique Arenas: From the New York cityscapes to the bustling streets of Seoul - every arena is a new challenge to conquer.6 Futuristic Gadgets To Master: Jet-fueled tools that give you the edge – mobility and flair all included. Narrative Campaign: Join rookie sensation Nina White in a fully voiced story mode as she rises through the ranks and battles for legendary status.Challenge Mode: Precision meets planning. Master each level with speed, smarts, and a hint of obsession. Optimize. Execute. Repeat.Global Leaderboards: Beat the best. Then make sure everyone knows it.BUILD YOUR LEGENDJetrunning isn’t just a sport…it’s a test of nerve, style, and split-second decision-making...It’s a way of life. Whether you’re chasing the fastest times, showing off your flashiest moves, or climbing the leaderboards, the stadium is your stage, and the arena is your own personal parkour playground… but remember, speed can only take you so far.LEGENDS DON’T FOLLOW PATHS – THEY CREATE THEMTo become a true Jetrunning legend, you’ve got to elevate your game. Master your arsenal of gadgets, time your boosts, and bend the arena to your will. Whether it’s shaving milliseconds off your run with a perfectly placed grapple, or discovering shortcuts no one’s dared try before, the path to greatness is anything but linear. Every arena is a puzzle begging to be broken, and the best runners don’t just play by the rules…they rewrite them. Experiment. Adapt.EVERY RUN IS A NEW OPPORTUNITYIn JETRUNNER, the finish line is just the beginning. With dozens of arenas, infinite route potential, and time-saving tricks waiting to be uncovered, every replay is a chance to push yourself further. Race against ghost replays of your own runs, chase the perfect route, and climb the global leaderboards or just beat your friend’s smug personal best. From split-second adjustments to bold new strategies, there's always another way to go faster, go flashier, and go viral.So tighten your laces, charge your giga-coils, and run like the cameras are always rolling! It’s time to show the world what you’ve got!

title: Jurassic World Evolution 3
overview: The next entry in the award-winning series, Jurassic World Evolution 3 puts you in control of building and running your very own Jurassic World. Help life find a way by synthesising, breeding, and nurturing prehistoric species. Manage each species and allow them to thrive, while helping your dinosaurs raise families and pass their genes onto future generations. Create incredible havens for your dinosaurs to help them flourish, build exciting new attractions to amaze guests, and maintain control when disaster inevitably strikes. With over 80 awe-inspiring pre-historic species, 75 of which allow you to manage, breed and nurture families of dinosaurs across entire generations. Rear them from playful juveniles into awe-inspiring adults, each with distinct female, male, and juvenile variants. Park guests will marvel as these majestic creatures socialise and react to the vibrant world around them. Manage unique social needs and observe brand new behaviours, with semi-aquatic dinosaurs venturing into deep water and pterosaurs walking on land.

title: Neyyah
overview: Neyyah is a first-person point-and-click adventure game, set within a collection of remote almost abandoned islands, separated by a series of complex portal machinery and laced with the fingerprints of two very intriguing cultures. Upon waking up from a strange dream, you find yourself transported to a place called Olujay, where you meet Vamir, who sends you to Neyyah in the hope you will be safe there. For reasons you will discover upon your many explorations, Vamir needs you for a matter of great urgency.  A wrong must be righted. A civilization avenged. A secret revealed. You end up on Neyyah with only a small amount of knowledge given to you by the frantic Vamir on what you’re supposed to do when you’re there. Things don't go as planned. In order to return to Olujay and reach Vamir, you will have to explore Neyyah – linking together the mechanical contraptions, rusted levers and blue plasma portal systems scattered throughout the bizarre landscapes, as you learn about the cultures that have shaped Neyyah.  Not everything is as it seems, and as you wander further into Neyyah's ancient heart, your discoveries will lead you to uncover the very truths behind the fate of Earth itself ...  Features Beautiful pre-rendered graphics, delivered with a high level of richness and realism. An original atmospheric soundtrack.Captivating sound design to bring you further into the world around you. An easy to use 2D style point and click interface, delivered with various cursor options so you'll always know what you are interacting with. Four movement transition settings: OFF / SPEED / NEUTRAL / RELAX, suited for each individual's style of gameplay. A 'Faster Travel' mode, where you can skip ahead of certain scenes to be able to travel quicker through the world, enabling you to get to where you need to be more effectively. Observe, take notes, think Neyyah reflects similar situations depicted within our own society, such as what is real, what is false, and being able to question your own beliefs. Through environmental storytelling, the player will enjoy hours of non-linear gameplay, solving puzzles through the use of close observation, visual links, writing down your own notes, using inventory items … while immersing yourself in a rich story and environment driven game. Let Neyyah become the world you were born to explore ...

title: Temple of the Green Moon
overview:
The plot develops around a famous blogger, an inveterate skeptic, who decides to go to the Zhigulyov Mountains to debunk myths about anomalous zones. All he is interested in is to ridicule and refute all these rumors and fairy tales. But what if mysterious forces and mysterious circumstances plunge him into a reality he never dared to even contemplate? In the dark psychological thriller "Temple of the Green Moon" you will immerse yourself in an atmosphere of mystery and riddles. Make unusual discoveries, learn the secrets of ancient rituals, collect rare collections. What features are waiting for you in the Zhigulyov Mountains? The ability to photograph objects hidden from the gaze of ordinary people and individual keeping of the hero's diary. In this game each of your actions will lead to the formation of pages in the diary. You will write your own story depending on your actions and your attentiveness.What awaits you:⚈ Keeping a diary: unique diary entries are generated based on game experience and actions
⚈ Photographing locations and identifying objects that are not visible to the casual eye
⚈ Exploring mysterious and enigmatic locations from a first-person perspective
⚈ Travel through different eras
⚈ Parkour and survival elements
⚈ Battles with mysterious entities
⚈ Deep plot
⚈ High quality and detailed visuals created with UE5
⚈ Choices that influence the hero's fate Discover the unknown together with the hero of the game, go all the way, plunge into the anomalous zone, which is located in the Zhigulev Mountains of the Samara region and come face to face with the unknown.

title: Outlaws + Handful of Missions: Remaster
overview:
From the team that brought you STAR WARS™: Dark Forces Remaster comes the return of the 1997 western FPS classic, Outlaws!
Saddle up and ride back into the Wild West with the gunslinging ex-Marshal, James Anderson, and face off against the good, the bad, and the even worse this side of the Mississippi as you work to uncover a twisted plot of greed and corruption. With your trusty six-shooting .45 Revolver, Scoped .44 Rifle, 10-Gauge Shotgun, and good ol' Sawed-Off 12-Gauge Shotgun, you'll be packin' plenty of firepower to take out all manner of outlaw varmints.
Outlaws   Handful of Missions features high-resolution, uncompressed cutscenes and updated visuals for weapons, characters, and enemies, all fully recreated from archived art and stylized to match the original look with full color palettes. Outlaws   Handful of Missions also offers Cross-Play Multiplayer with game modes including Deathmatch, Team Play, Capture the Flag, and Kill The Fool With The Chicken!
It's Payback Time.
Outlaws   Handful of Missions Remastered Key Features:
- Engaging first-person ground combat featuring five weapon types.
- Up to 4K 120FPS visuals.
- Modern gamepad support adds a new weapon wheel, rumble, and motion/gyro controls.
- 26 Achievements to unlock!
- A Vault filled with a treasure trove of behind-the-scenes gold nuggets.

title: Europa Universalis V
overview: Almost five hundred years of history unfold before you in Europa Universalis V, the latest version of one of the greatest strategy games of all time. Guide the destiny of any of hundreds of nations and societies in a simulated living world of unparalleled depth and complexity.

title: Phantom House
overview:
New Survival Horror!
About the GamePhantom House is a third-person survival horror game that plunges you into an abandoned house once home to dark rituals. Explore eerie halls, face unspeakable horrors, and rely on your wits and weapon to survive the unknown.About Phantom HousePhantom House is a third-person survival horror game that takes you into an abandoned house steeped in dark rituals. Explore eerie corridors, uncover hidden secrets, and brace yourself for the horrors lurking in the shadows.Key FeaturesWith limited resources, you’ll need to fight off relentless enemies, solve puzzles, and survive the unknown. Armed with only your gun and wits, discover the truth behind the house’s sinister past while navigating its chilling interiors and haunting grounds.

title: On My Way Out
overview: On My Way Out is a heartwarming adventure game about a spinning top trying to watch the sunset with his friends. The problem - the front gate won't budgePlay as Culver, who will have to spin, jump and dive through the obstacles the neighborhood contains in order to find a way out. Explore daunting paths through the surrounding forest, lakes and desert, uncover the secrets this world holds, recover stolen relics, and meet your neighbors.Meet the NeighborsYou don’t know them that well, but that doesn’t mean they weren’t always out there. They might be able to help.Mysteries to MusterThis world holds tight to it’s secrets, but if you can crack the code, you can conquer the universe.The Show Might Not Go OnHelp recover museum relics or a neighbor’s vision will be forgotten to time...again.Oyster WorldLike an oyster, this world is what you make of it. Many paths can lead to the same destination, so explore to your heart's content. Good luck.

title: Civil Purgatory
overview:
JOIN US ON DISCORD!
About the GameThis game is an AI-driven experience, it is evolving and may not represent the final product.Interrogate. Investigate. Judge.In Civil Purgatory, you are a state officer tasked with evaluating detained civilians under a totalitarian regime. Each day, you'll receive a new case file with photographs, documents, intelligence reports, and confiscated items — from personal belongings to weapons and valuables.Real-Time AI-Generated DialogueEvery interrogation is powered by artificial intelligence, generating unique, unscripted conversations for each case. Civilians respond differently depending on your tone, pressure, and strategy — offering a dynamic and immersive experience every time.Search, Analyze, and ReportYou can order a patrol unit to search the suspect’s home. Their findings — hidden items, incriminating objects, or personal clues — may become vital in your investigation. You must connect the dots, identify inconsistencies, and support your judgment with evidence.Confiscate. Appraise. Profit.Your inventory can include weapons, valuables, or personal effects. Some can be appraised and sold between shifts to cover your daily expenses. But every action has ethical weight — and you are being evaluated constantly.Your Report MattersAt the end of each case, write a formal justification for your decision. Was the civilian guilty or innocent? Your logic and clarity will be reviewed by an AI system. Promotions, salary, and progression depend on the strength of your conclusions.Time is LimitedA working digital clock tracks your shift. When the alarm sounds, your day ends — regardless of progress. Manage your time wisely: interrogate, investigate, write… or leave tasks unfinished.Endless JudgementThis game has no ending. Play indefinitely with randomized civilians, increasingly complex scenarios, and persistent evaluation of your actions.FeaturesAI-generated conversations with real-time responses
Photographs, ID documents, and intelligence reports
Personal, valuable, and illegal items to analyze
Home searches conducted by patrol divisions
Appraisal and item selling system between shifts
Written reports reviewed and scored by AI
Promotion system and evolving salary
Shift time management with digital clock and alarm
Pixel art visuals and oppressive atmosphere
Endless mode with unlimited replayabilityWill you follow orders… or your conscience?Every civilian has a story. Every object has meaning. Every judgment is yours alone.
Welcome to Civil Purgatory.

title: Overpowered 1 - Mars Infestation
overview: Exterminate menacing creatures!The year is 2050. Humans have been forced to flee Earth and colonize Mars! Now it’s up to you to exterminate hordes of aggressive local creatures so your kind can settle on the planet.Overpowered 1 - Mars Infestation is an action-packed survival shooter presented in fluidly animated pixel art style! Step into the boots of a spacefaring soldier as you tackle 4 intense story missions, each with multiple objectives and levels to master.Use intuitive twin-stick controls to move around top-down environments with determination and speed while gunning down all incoming threats. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons on the fly! The faster you take down enemies, the higher your score will climb, allowing you to challenge leaderboards in survival mode. How long can you stay in the fight?Features:Exterminate waves of incoming enemies.Run, evade, aim and fire with intuitive twin-stick controls.Take on 4 story missions, each with multiple objectives!Challenge online leaderboards in survival mode.Enjoy retro pixel art aesthetics and a pumping soundtrack!

title: Massi vs. José
overview: Your cats have been kidnapped by your brother and now they're in danger!Massi vs. José is a reimagination of the first adventure of Massi, released back in 2016. Be ready to test your skills by beating 40 levels filled with coins and collectibles. There are a variety of different platforms that will shape your journey through all the 8 worlds of this game.Key FeaturesBeautiful pixel art, expressive animations and stunning visual effects.8 worlds with different themes, each one with 5 levels. That's a total of 40 levels to explore and get 3 stars in each one of them!Grab the key in each level to go to the next!Unlock achievements and climb the leaderboards.Controller support.Cloud Save: don't lose your progress!

title: Pixel Fortress: Tower Defense
overview:
Retro Tower Defense!
About the GamePixel Fortress is a retro-inspired tower defense game packed with fast-paced real-time strategy. Build your defenses, command powerful abilities, and unleash devastating energy blasts to hold off relentless enemy waves. Can you master the battlefield?About Pixel FortressPixel Fortress is a fast-paced, retro-inspired tower defense game where strategy meets action. Build defenses, deploy troops, and unleash powerful magic rays to stop relentless enemy waves. Adapt your tactics and master the battlefield in pixel-perfect style.Key FeaturesWith nostalgic pixel art and fluid gameplay, Pixel Fortress delivers intense tactical challenges. Face tougher foes, experiment with strategies, and test your skills in real-time battles. Will your fortress withstand the siege?

title: Wanech's C.A.N.
overview: After wrapping up the hit Amborettio, Wanech transformed his trusty C.A.N. into a cozy green-themed pub serving brew, burgers, fries, and wings. The place hums with synthwave tracks, punctuated by chiptune sound effects, giving it a playful retro vibe.In this top-down, casual cooking sim with arcade twists, you’ll serve hungry customers by cooking food in a unique way: as meals rain down the screen, hit the correct W, A, S, D keys in sequence to prepare each order. Master the rhythm of the kitchen and deliver every plate!Nobody really knows why Wanech traded adventure for appetizers—though rumor has it, it’s all to raise awareness for Amborettio. Whatever the reason, your mission is clear: keep the pub buzzing, the customers smiling, and the orders flowing!Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

title: Day Of The Tank
overview:
Defend your Command Post from waves of enemy tanks by killing all of them. Fight across multiple destructible levels.FeaturesPlayer Tanks
They are equipped with an auto-loader that can reload shells in one second. Base/Command PostKeep it safe, and don't shoot it yourself. Three hits and it is destroyed.Enemy Tanks                  Each enemy uses a different navigation algorithm to find the CP or you. Kill them all to beat the level.There are also special enemies that are armored:                   or drop powerups:                    PowerupsCall in an artillery strike to decimate your enemiesSpeed up your reload speed and blanket a lane with shellsGenerate a temporary force field around your tank for protection Repair and give temporary invulnerability to your CPAcquire an additional lifeFreeze all enemies on the battlefield for a moment

title: These Are Them
overview: This game doesn't have a tutorial as it is a game that is meant to be beaten as the player learns more about each of its levels and characters that being said allow me to tell you a thing or two about this game and a little of what you can expect. The goal is simple protect the hearts known as "these" from the wave of enemies trying to attack the "these" . The forces you fight are known as the "them" and they take on many otherworldly and uncanny forms with the soul purpose of consuming what remains of the hopeless world. in this world a fraction of light still remains as those branded with a mark of "forward"  can prevent the spread of the corruption and resist it themselves. When collecting a mark of "forward" it will recharge a small amount of energy allowing for the host it bonds with to use more of their special abilities. Every survivor has their own unique special ability and can be used as much as they like so long as they have the stamina left to unleash them.(press the confirm key/button during a stage to unleash your special attack every survivor has limited special uses per stage and collecting a mark of forward will replenish some uses so use them wisely .)now before you purchase this game it features:5 playable characters 7 levels of playable content and a whole lot of challenge while the game can be beaten in 10 minutes for some it may take 10 hours or even 10 centuries to beat as it is meant to be challenge that you will need to solve in order to beat a test of sorts so the choice is yours flee now or face the challenge.This game contains loud sounds and flashing lights so avoid playing if you have epilepsy or other health issues when playing games that feature these elements. no additional content is planned for this game however if circumstances change then any additional content added to this game will be free of charge.

title: Cozy Crunch
overview:
A cozy, upgrade filled, adventure that goes from curious kitty to unstoppable leaf-crunching beast.  Stomp, explore, and uncover cozy forest secrets with your magical fairy guide.Time your triple stomps to the music for a special attackCollect hidden treasuresSurvive wild windsCustomize your character
Cozy Crunch is a gentle, whimsical adventure where you guide a curious cat through a crunchy leaf-filled forest using a magical fairy (your mouse cursor). Stomp leaves, uncover secrets, and explore hand-crafted areas filled with cozy atmosphere and charming surprises.Features:Simple point and click controls4 hand crafted areasA hidden rhythm mechanic - time your triple stomps to the music to unleash powerful wavesRelaxing original soundtrackCharacter customization (50+ variations)Multiple progression paths with quests, hidden items, and upgradesSteam achievementsGame Duration: ~3-4+ hoursWishlist Cozy Crunch and prepare to leaf your worries behindWhat Streamers are Saying“I’ve come to the conclusion this game is weirdly therapeutic!” -ImCadeAbout the gameHi! I’m Jo, a solo indie developer, and this is my first game. Cozy Crunch is inspired by the charm of classic online flash games. Simple, relaxing, and designed to be enjoyed in a single cozy evening. I hope it brings you a bit of calm and delight, just like it did for me while creating it.

title: Monster Manor
overview: Manage a special manor that rests on the side of your screen. Battle invading monsters, then recruit them to become your diligent farmers. Develop your estate and challenge new levels during work and leisure, making your manor more prosperous and powerful than ever!"From this day forward, say goodbye to war. Plant fields, harvest crops, with food and shelter provided. The monster farmers will now live a new life of peace and contentment."Non-Intrusive GameplayMonster Manor sits quietly on the side of your screen, never disturbing your daily work. You can freely adjust its position and size on the screen.Automated ProductionYour diligent monster farmers will automatically plant, water, and harvest, continuously generating gold for you. Hundreds of monsters will become your exclusive farmers, achieving full automation.Challenge LevelsTake on ever-escalating levels and tidal waves of enemies. Face more powerful bosses and bring them all under your command.Multiple Tower TypesBuild a wide variety of defensive towers, each with unique upgrade paths, to construct an impregnable line of defense.Powerful SkillsUnlock and upgrade powerful skills to maximize your damage output!Optimized PerformancePerformance has been meticulously optimized to run smoothly even with a large number of units on screen.(A frame rate option is available in the settings to adjust according to performance needs.)

title: Blendkins
overview: Explore the florest in search of Blendkins, camouflaged animals that hides from people and help the nature.The fame of these curious and cute animals made people want to own then as pets.How do you catch a Blendkin?Can you take care of one?Blendkins will take you to explore this world and discover how to have your own, but pay attention, owning a Blendkin may have unforseen consequences...Features:Find Blendkins! Fictional animals that blend in nature to hide, there will be 5 Blendkins in the final version.Explore the forest! Explore the forest based off the Atlantic Forest.Take care! Try to take care of Blendkins as pets and see how they live in the city.Use Starrygram! Starrygram, a fictional social media inside the game, can be explored and see what kind of post is a trend there.

title: Odd Dorable
overview:
Embark on a short, playful adventure through this cozy and welcoming open world filled with different puzzles to solve. Uncover hidden secrets and help the princess find all her lost candies. Rediscover your inner child as the game evokes a sense of wonder and curiosity.
Little Features:⏰ Around 30 minutes to 1 hour of playtime!☁️ Step into a world of pure imagination, lovingly crafted together with my daughter!🏝️ Explore different playful locations and solve puzzles!🤪 Meet a small cast of quirky characters!🎒 Find all six magic candies and help the princess reclaim her magical powers.
This game uses visual storytelling, so no language is needed to play and fully enjoy the experience.
⚠️ Attention: This game is digestible 😋🍴
A digestible game respects its players' money and time, is designed around a single idea, and doesn’t overstay its welcome. We want you to be able to finish our games in just a short session without ever making you feel stuffed, so to say.

title: Avitium
overview: Play as Milowit, knight commander and favored of the king, as he lives out the final days of his sovereign Kingdom of Avitium. After all is said and done, make the choice to stay or go.Build your deck and use it to defeat your enemies in turn-based card battler combat.Establish and defend your convictions through narrative, trick-taking gameplay.Engage with a hand-textured 3D world, split across two environments.Play through the main story or test your deckbuilding and combat skills to see how far you can get in endless mode.

title: Give 1 bit to GustavoGek
overview: No screaming 🤫Dê 1 Bit ao GustavoGek is a questionable mix of horror and comedy. Just after you insult your favorite streamer, you’re dragged into a cursed game controlled by the unpredictable GlitchedGus — and now, you must collect and deliver bits to him, as he pleases. Get ready to face levels filled with challenges and bizarre enemies.Inspired by the famous nextbots — mechanic of PNGs that chase you non-stop — the game takes this concept to the extreme with plot twists, hidden secrets, not-that-hard puzzles, and a sus sense of humor, all wrapped in a chaotic environment.You can laugh, you can shit yourself, you can laugh until you shit yourself... but don’t forget to give 1 bit.WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS AND IMAGES

title: PButtons
overview:
Have you ever felt the urge to press a button — even when you knew you weren’t supposed to? In shops, museums, or even at home, there’s something irresistible about a shiny red button just sitting there, begging to be pushed.What will happen if you press it?
Will a mechanism spring to life? Will lights flash? Will an alarm sound? Or… will it explode?PButtons turns that instinct into a puzzle game. Here, the red buttons — called PButtons (for Passive) — are just out of reach. You can't click them with your mouse. Instead, they must be triggered by something else in the environment: a falling object, a mechanical arm, a chain reaction — anything but your direct input.Your only control? The AButtons (for Active) — square buttons in various colors that you can press to interact with the level. These stand in contrast to the round, red PButtons, which serve as passive elements within each puzzle.Every level is a small logical machine: press the right AButton at the right time, and you might trigger a mechanism that helps activate the PButton. Understand how the system works, solve the puzzle, and enjoy the deep satisfaction of watching that forbidden red button finally light up.

title: Guns Cant Walk
overview: In Guns Can’t Walk, movement isn’t just part of the game — it’s the challenge. You can’t run, you can’t walk… your only way forward is through recoil. Armed with a skateboard and a shotgun, you’ll use controlled chaos to fling yourself across office floors and into ridiculous situations — all while racing the clock and fighting gravity.Inspired by the punishing spirit of Foddian platformers, Guns Can’t Walk is a rage-inducing, skill-based climb where every mistake costs you progress… and every perfect landing feels like a victory.

title: Candylands Journey
overview: The young sorceress studying at the Magic Academy sets off on a journey to return the Magic Crystal. Using various magic, she overcomes the path to the Dark Portal, fighting monsters, solving riddles and destroying the cake towers that block the way.The Pastry Witches are trying to stop the sorceress with all their might. They have placed magical doors on her way that need to be opened with the keys, and have hidden puzzle pieces to activate the Dark Portal.Candylands Journey is a classic 2D platformer inspired by the games of the 90's. Explore locations drawn in pixel art style, where secrets with jewels are hidden on each level, in exchange for which you can buy new magic wands or hats with unique abilities.FeaturesCollect jewelry fragments to buy unique types of magic.Pass through the green meadows, dark caves, deep rivers and oceans, mystic castles, ruins, islands and other colorful locations.Explore 15 colorful locations, look for lost puzzle pieces to open the way to the last boss.Destroy all the cake towers and solve all the riddles.

title: Capital Cities Trivia
overview: How well do you know your Capital Cities?See if you can name the capital city of every country in the world!Capital Cities Trivia has never been so much fun. Challenge yourself or have a trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode! Choose from the most popular geographical categories including Europe, North America, The 50 States, and World Capitals.Capital Cities Trivia Includes:- All 7 Continents of the World.- All 195 Countries in the World.- All 50 U.S. States.- All 13 Canadian Provinces and Territories.- All 31 States of Mexico.FEATURES- Single Player Mode.- Party Mode (Up to 4 Players).- Gamepad Support.- Family Friendly.- Fun for all ages.So what are you waiting for? Download it now and get your brain ready for Capital Cities Trivia!

title: Sweet Bathhouse
overview: Sweet Bathhouse - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with a bathhouse theme. It tells the daily life of five beautiful and cute girls in the bathhouse, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.- The game has three difficulty levels: 2x2, 2x4, and 4x4 puzzles- Press the "F" key to turn on the black and white picture when solving the puzzle- Players can complete the puzzle by pressing the 'blank' key during the game.- Players can quickly view the girls' pictures in the gallery by pressing the AD key, left and right keys, or left and right mouse keys* The puzzle picture size is 800x960 px* The gallery picture size is 1088x960 px

title: Crossed Commands: Collision
overview: In creating games, Into the Breach has become an indispensable source of inspiration for me due to its outstanding strategic depth and unique game mechanics. Here, I express my deepest respect and gratitude to the creators of Into the Breach.In this turn-based strategy game, you'll pilot versatile mechs in thrilling duels against formidable foes. With each victory, you'll earn precious parts that will be invaluable resources for crafting your own unique mech.Flexible and maneuverableWith exceptional mobility, the mech can launch surprise attacks or counter-offensives, ensuring you stay ahead on the battlefield.Seize the key pointPush enemies off the battlefield with clever maneuvers, or crush them with exceptional weaponry.Master strategyIn this battlefield, terrain and enemy intelligence are equally crucial. Analyze your opponent meticulously, and cleverly exploit the environment to craft the perfect tactics, turning the enemy's attacks into your own offensive! Your counterattack will be as fierce as a sudden storm!Assemble your own mechDefeat foes, collect parts, and craft your unique mech. Equip powerful weapons and tackle tougher challenges! Your mech will be unstoppable on the battlefield!

title: Drive Thru
overview: Drive Thru is a single player cooking time management game where the player must be fast and precise in order to maintain a good overall restaurant rating. Rearrange your workstation to optimize your workflow, assemble various burgers, and don't burn the fries!  FeaturesServe your drive thru customers quickly and accurately to get 5 star ratings.Contains many sides and ingredients: from pineapple and eggs on your burger to blueberry muffins, donuts, and coffee for breakfast.Don't drop the food on the floor or let it sit too long on a table or it will eventually spoil! Customers may customize their orders such as ask for a cheeseburger with extra cheese and a slice of tomato. Rearrange your grill, tables, and ingredients to the most ideal setup.Clear debris to get more space.Don't undercook or overcook burgers.Package the food and hand it off at the drive thru window. Manage your character's sprint energy.Tutorial, 3 levels, and an unlimited mode.Has both keyboard and controller support.

title: Galacard: Ackian Archives
overview: All three Galacard games in one package! Galacard: Ackian Archives is a collection of modern ports of games from the Galacard series using the original graphics and enhanced music. The games included are:Galacard (2024) - The basic Galacard experienceGalacard Platinum (2024) - Featuring an item shop and a new win systemGalacard Advance (2025) - Includes extra modes and different backgroundsThis series takes place in Planet Ack, which is inhabited by friendly people called Ackians. This small planet's favorite pastime is a traditional card game knows as Galacard, which they always like to teach to those who visit them.  Yes, that includes YOU!. All three games were remade almost from scratch with modern systems in mind, while still retaining most elements from the original releases. The general rules for Galacard are included in the menu.-- Controls  --KeyboardArrow Keys - Move CursorEnter - Start/Choose Game/PauseSpace - ConfirmAlt+Enter - Change Display Mode (Window/Fullscreen)ControllerD-Pad - Move CursorStart - Start/Choose Game/PauseA (Bottom Button) - Confirm

title: Grocery Run
overview: In the game, you'll play as the Harry and Larry brothers, two twin 9-year-old's who are on their quest to complete the annual Grocery Run event and win its grand prize. PUT YOUR REFLEXES TO THE TEST• Fly through 24 colorful grocery aisle levels that get progressively faster and harder.• Dodge hazardous obstacles scattered throughout including fish crates, ladders, snowballs, and more - this isn't your ordinary grocery store outing!• Collect tasty treats such as fruit, candy, and, yes, even vegetables because Mom said we need more fiber in our diet.DISCOVER NEW ABILITIES• Get temporary invincibility and knock back those pesky fish crates.• Grab a shield for one-time protection against hazards.• Bounce off bumpers to reach extra treats.• Fly through speed-up and speed-down chambers to change your speed (and the music tempo).SIMPLE CONTROLS• Use your mouse to move Harry and Larry up and down, while they automatically fly forward.

title: 齿轮
overview: Who Are You?In 'Gear', players will take on the role of a delivery person. While delivering food to a mysterious resident, you discover the 'glitches' in this world. You will even use elements from outside the game scene to solve various bizarre puzzles and ultimately understand the truth of this world.Game FeaturesA short narrative-driven puzzle game, lasting around ten minutes.GameplayPlayer will control the character to move horizontally, using clicking and perspective shifts to solve puzzles.

title: The Ultimate Box Games
overview: Play against your friends and others, racing to complete an absurdly simple task: Moving stuff. Playing as robots who simply pick up objects and put them back down(sometimes in a throwing fasion) you compete to see who is the best. In rounds jam packed with physics objects, power ups and a few missiles, you must use everything around you to show your skill. Whether as a robot, mini-fridge, vending machine or other square-ish appliance, fight the odds and become a master at what you were designed to do.Fight in either local or online multiplayer games, with a variety of levels and characters to choose from.Muddy Creek Games is a small one man studio hoping to make silly, fun and "homegrown" experiences for all.

title: Velvet Hearth
overview:
Explore your deepest desires in a cozy, provocative home full of surprises.
In Velvet Hearth, you play as a charming femboy living in a rustic, vintage-style house. While modest at first glance, each room hides visual delights, secret objects, and intimate pleasures.This house is your safe space. Move freely through every corner — from the living room to the bedroom — discovering a variety of erotic toys scattered around. Dildos of all shapes, sizes, and colors await your curiosity and boldness. Each one offers a unique sensual animation, carefully crafted to highlight the protagonist's body and movements.You decide how, where, and when to indulge: alone on the living room couch at sunset, or maybe on your knees on the cold bathroom floor. Who knows — perhaps later, with your teasing cousin at your side?🔞 Explicit adult content with erotic animations
🏡 Intimate rustic house full of personality
💋 Femboy protagonist free to explore and give in to pleasure
🍆 Wide variety of interactive dildos with unique visuals and effectsVelvet Hearth is more than a game — it’s an invitation to relax, explore, and connect with desire.
After all, between wooden walls, the hottest secrets are revealed.
